# TabSearchActivation

**Structure**

Configures the activation behavior of search in the search tab.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TabSearchActivation
```

## Overview

You can configure this for a particular [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView] by using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/tabViewSearchActivation(_:)] modifier.

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: The default search activation behavior.
- **searchTabSelection**: Links the search tab’s selection to search activation.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
